title: Polki & Pearl Nakshatra Jhumka
features: Intricate Polki setting with traditional Nakshatra flower motif at the stud. Features a cascading design with a central ruby, and pearl drops. Handmade with meticulous detail, showcasing impeccable craftsmanship. The unique triangular element between studs and drops gives them a modern style.
description: A timeless blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The high-quality Polki diamonds and lustrous South Sea pearls ensure a radiant and sophisticated look. Crafted with exceptional attention to detail, these Jhumkas are a treasured heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a unique shine and luxurious appeal.
